resources.string: HAMGIS is a complete geographic measurement system consisting of watch and phone components.

Watch app supports two working modes:

1. Area Measurement Mode: Focused on farmland measurement, automatically calculates area and perimeter
2. GIS Collection Mode: Professional version, can collect point, line, and polygon features simultaneously

Operations:
- Short press "Collect": Collect point
- Short press "Finish": Complete current feature
- Long press "Finish": Complete entire GIS project

Phone app serves as data reception and export center:

1. Ensure Zepp App is running in background
2. Phone automatically receives data after watch sends it
3. Supports export to CSV, GeoJSON, KML, JSON formats
4. JSON format optimized with complete project information

Export format descriptions:

CSV: Suitable for Excel viewing, includes project summary
GeoJSON: Standard GIS format, supports ArcGIS, QGIS and other software
KML: Google Earth format, includes coordinates and attributes
JSON: Complete project data with formatted display

Mode switching:

In watch settings, you can switch application mode:
- Area Measurement Mode: Suitable for quick farmland measurement
- GIS Collection Mode: Suitable for professional field collection, one project can contain multiple feature types

Data sync workflow:

1. Watch measurement â†’ Click "Export to Android"
2. Wait for phone to receive data (approximately 5-30 seconds)
3. Phone displays data preview
4. Select export format
5. Select save location
6. File saved successfully

Common issues:

Q: Data not received?
A: Check if Zepp App is running in background, ensure watch and phone connection is normal

Q: Export failed?
A: Ensure data format is correct, try resending data

Q: JSON export format error?
A: JSON formatting issue fixed, ensure exported JSON is valid
